entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 a.m. MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early this morning then cloudy. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
